titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Fiji
Fiji

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Access to the National Archives is governed by the Public Records Act and an Amendment to the Act (2006). Under these two acts, government records are transferred to the National Archives after 15 years and records older than 30 years are available for public access.

div.head: Location
div.p: Street Address: 25 Carnavon Street (Corner of Kimberly and Carnavon Street) Suva.
Postal Address: PO Box 2125, Government Buildings, Suva, Fiji

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers must contact the National Archives in writing to apply for access.
